data.text: Ephraim 12:1 That is, the northern kingdom of Israel; also in verses 8 and 14 chases the wind
The LORD also brings a charge against Judah.
In the womb he grasped his brother’s heel,
Yes, he struggled with the angel 12:4 Or Angel and prevailed;
the LORD is the God of Hosts—
But you must return to your God,
And Ephraim boasts: “How rich I have become!
But I am the LORD your God
Jacob fled to the land of Aram 12:12 That is, northwest Mesopotamia
But by a prophet the LORD brought Israel out of Egypt,
